content.body: Or maybe it would be cleaner if we made `Observable` a special type in Web IDL, so you wouldn't be able to return async iterables, but had to instead return an Observable or Stream, which I think is what we would (always?) want.
content.formatted_body: Or maybe it would be cleaner if we made Observable a special type in Web IDL, so you wouldn't be able to return async iterables, but had to instead return an Observable or Stream, which I think is what we would (always?) want.
